data.subject_line: The Secret to Sustainable Fashion This Autumn
data.preheader: Discover eco-friendly trends and their impact

elements.title: EcoStyle Insights
elements.text: Explore how EcoStyle is leading the way in sustainable fashion. Discover the journey of organic cotton jackets dyed naturally, saving CO₂ and water.

elements.title: Recycled Jeans Trend
elements.text: Uncover the benefits of high-waisted recycled jeans by GreenWear. See how these pieces are reshaping wardrobes while conserving resources.

products: Giacca in cotone organico con tintura naturale
data.additional_content: Inserisci dati sull’impatto etico (CO₂ risparmiata, acqua non sprecata).

custom_prompt: Usa un tono informale rivolto a un pubblico giovane.
